issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Test steps:
1. Install KS (in our case it is an App with custom info.plist with version #) from Studio on device, make sure there is no KS previously installed on device. 

2. Change SDK build in tiapp.xml, save it and install on device. There will be an iTunes dialog window, asking to replace an existing App. Please, do.

3. Go to iTunes device's Apps.

Actual result:
After step 3 NO automatic "resync" happened, and there is "Remove" button next to the App instead "Update". The only way to replace an App is to delete it from device and install it from iTunes again.

Expected result:
After step 3 the button "Update" should be next to the App, so the App could be updated.
fields.summary: iOS: - App with custom info.plist with version number in it will not trigger resync of App in iTunes.
fields.environment:
Tested on:
Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.0.201212101208
Titanium SDK, build 3.0.0.v20121211174657
MacBookPro 10.8.2 Mountain Lion
Xcode 4.6
